snippet: There has been a growing appreciation among many Italians that the government is deadly serious in countering what is considered one of the chief scourges of Italian society: a failure to declare taxes.
abstract: Italian officials have opened a new, all-out war against tax evaders, hoping to close Italy’s $2.5 trillion public debt and revive a frail economy that has been buffeted by the euro crisis; in addition to banning cash transactions, it has included an ad campaign comparing tax evaders to parasites.
lead_paragraph: There has been a growing appreciation among many Italians that the government is deadly serious in countering what is considered one of the chief scourges of Italian society: a failure to declare taxes.

headline.main: Tax Cheats Become Italy’s Public Enemy
headline.print_headline: Italy Intensifies Its All-Out War on Tax Evaders
